ewu.embroidit.parkc.io.XML

Class XMLPatternAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ewu.embroidit.parkc.io.XML.XMLPatternAdapter

  • public class XMLPatternAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds an XML binding that stores all necessary pattern information for writing to XML.
